basics.name: Pavel Palauniou

basics.summary: Hello! I'm a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in public clouds, automation, and high-available systems. Experienced in optimizing production infrastructure, improving deployment processes, and ensuring system security and stability.

Assist developers in troubleshooting Oracle Cloud, AWS, Kubernetes, GitLab pipelines,  Auth0,  WebLogic, and Database issues.

Optimize infrastructure by refactoring Terraform, CloudFormation and Ansible code reducing provisioning time.
